title: Ngay Wandabaa (My Spirit)
creator_credit: Ian Brown, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: ‘Ian Brown’ dedicates this Digital Story to his family and friends. He illustrates his life through the contributions and sacrifices made by the people closest to him, the encouragement of his parents, support of his sisters and sense of fraternity that he found with his friends when at school on his scholarship.
